html.display_name: Magnetic Field in the Center of a Rectangular Wire Loop
html.p: A rectangular wire loop of width [mathjaxinline]a[/mathjaxinline] and length [mathjaxinline]b[/mathjaxinline] carries a current [mathjaxinline]I[/mathjaxinline] in a clockwise direction. Using the Biot-Savart Law, find the magnetic field in the center of the rectangle.
